plot: Black Jack is the mysterious doctor whose past is unknown, but skills are legendary. The rich and powerful seek him to help when conventional doctors fail, but rumour says he isn't even licensed.
opening_theme: "Kioku no Kimi e (To You in My Memory)" by Another Moon (eps 4-5)
ending_theme: "I'll Be Back Again --- Moonlight" by Rhodes (eps 1-3)
"Kono omoi tsutaerareru (I Thought I Could Convey This Feeling...)" by Another Moon (eps 4-5)
"HOPE --- Not to be defeated, not to cry, and not to be daunted" by Kudo Eiko (eps 7-10)
